# Welcome to Session 2!

## Clinical Applications

This session covers the practical application of PK/PD principles in clinical settings.

## Learning Objectives

-   Apply PK/PD concepts to clinical scenarios
-   Understand dose optimization strategies
-   Explore real-world case studies

## Topics Covered

1.  Clinical PK/PD modeling
2.  Therapeutic drug monitoring
3.  Case studies in antimicrobial therapy
4.  Dose optimization strategies

## Next Steps

Continue with practical exercises and hands-on applications.
